replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Azitate 于 2020-3-3 11:53 编辑 
pangzhi1263 发表于 2020-3-3 11:49
哇，抱歉，昨天忘了上MCBBS了。
就是因为坐着的示例没用，所以才来问的啦~你看我上面问题都写着了~我试过 ...
我也没用过这两个参数。。所以不太清楚，作者机器人给出的详细解答是这样的,你可以再看看
#infront
[Syntax:](infront{view=[VALUE];action=[BOOL]||[CAST]||[CASTINSTEAD]})

Usage:
======
**TargetConditions** True if the target is infront the caster and in the given field of vision. Default=45

<view= angle>
<action= TRUE/FALSE || CAST || CASTINSTEAD>

[Dependings:](mythicmobsext)复制代码#isbehind
[Syntax:](isbehind{view=[ANGLE_VALUE];action=[BOOL]||[CAST]||[CASTINSTEAD]})

Usage:
======
**TargetConditions** True if the target is behind the caster and in the given field of vision. Default=45

<view= angle>
<action= TRUE/FALSE || CAST || CASTINSTEAD>

[Dependings:](mythicmobsext)复制代码

replies.author: Azitate
replies.txt_content: - behind{view=90;action=true}复制代码- infront{view=10;action=false}复制代码作者WIKI给出的示例,试试看？作者discord的机器人宕机了，暂时获取不到详细的使用例子
